'''SA'''ntos| former_affiliations = [[Banahaw Broadcasting Corporation|BBC]] (1973-1986)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 5 Watts| homepage = | }} '''DXSA-TV''', channel 10, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]]. Its studios are located at City Heights, General Santos City. ==See also== *[[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]] {{General Santos TV}} {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[Category:Television stations in General Santos]] [[Category:Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation stations]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] [[ceb:DXSA-TV]]
